column1: Local Foods////I gave this place 5 stars because I really like their food
column2: but something really weird was going on this last time I went here.  To start off
column3: the place was completely empty on a Sunday at 2pm. I'm not exaggerating
column4: there literally wasn't another person in there besides me.  And it wasn't until I sat down to eat my food that I noticed something was off.  The table seemed different to me
column6: not at all what I'm used to at local.  And when my food came here it was arranged differently
column7: and on a brightly colored paper plate
column8: even though my fork was metal.. The whole meal seemed a little different to me.
